thread.section_title: Kampala Serena Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Family Visit with our lusophone community and our employee
thread.title_full: Family Visit with our lusophone community and our employee - Review of Kampala Serena Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Arinos M
title: Family Visit with our lusophone community and our employee
text:
We came on a family to have the buffet in Serena hotel restaurant and we are happy with service. This is not our first time. Even
previous times we have enjoyed. We advise all tourist that want a buffet to pass through this restaurant.
